src:
KPU Bonebol Lauching Tahapan Pilkada Tahun 2020
03 Nov 2019, 10:02 by Taufik Usman



KPU Bonebol Lauching Tahapan Pilkada Tahun 2020



KPU Bonebol Lauching Tahapan Pilkada Tahun 2020



KPU Bonebol Lauching Tahapan Pilkada Tahun 2020


KBRN, Gorontalo: Kabupaten Bone Bolango (Bonebol) merupakan salah satu dari tiga daerah di Gorontalo yang akan melaksanakan Pemilihan Kepala Daerah (Pilkada) tahun 2020. Mengawali semua tahapan, Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Kabupaten Bone Bolango melauching tahapan pilkada yang dipusatkan di Center Point Alun-Alun Bone Bolango, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Peluncuran tahapan Pilkada Bone Bolango dihadiri Komisioner KPU RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi, Bupati Bone Bolango Hamim Pou, berserta jajaran komisioner KPU kabupaten/kota se Gorontalo.
Komisioner KPU RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi menekankan, penyelenggara Pemilihan Kepala Daerah hendaknya memegang teguh integritas, dan memberikan porsi yang sama kepada kontestan pilkada.
“Teman-teman KPU Bone Bolango, teman-teman Bawaslu bisa menjalankan tugas dan kewenangannya sesuai dengan ketentuan yang berlaku, sesuai dengan nilai-nilai etik yang sudah kita gariskan bersama”Jelas Komisioner KPU RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi
Kepada masyarakat Bone Bolango, Pramono Ubaid Tantowi juga berpesan agar tidak berharap pada politik uang melainkan merasakan apa yang dikerjakan Kepala Daerah selama 5 tahun.
“Kepada masyarakat jangan minta sesuatu kepada calon selama pilkada yang lima tahun sekali itu paling tinggi juga seratus ribu, tetapi anda harus mengharapkan kinerja kepala daerah itu selama lima tahun. Dengan kinerja yang baik itu kita betul-betul berharap masyarakat merasakan nilai dari demokrasi kita”tambahnya
Lauching Tahapan Pilkada Bone Bolango Tahun 2020 ditandai dengan pelepasan balon, dan peluncuran Maskot Pilkada Bonebol yang disebut “Kopino” dan diringi music Polopalo (Alat Music Tradisional Gorontalo)
Sebelumnya, kegiatan tersebut diawali dengan senam bersama penyelenggara dengan masyarakat Bone Bolango.
text:
KPU Bonebol Lauching Stages in 2020 Election
03 Nov 2019, 10:02 by Taufik Usman



KPU Bonebol Lauching Stages in 2020 Election



KPU Bonebol Lauching Stages in 2020 Election



KPU Bonebol Lauching Stages in 2020 Election


KBRN, Gorontalo: Bone Bolango Regency (Bonebol) is one of the three regions in Gorontalo that will carry out the Regional Head Election (Pilkada) in 2020. Starting all stages, the General Election Commission (KPU) of Bone Bolango Regency launches the stages of the elections which are centered at the Center Point Bolango Bone Square, Sunday (3/11/2019).
The launch of the Bone Bolango regional election stage was attended by KPU Commissioner RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi, Bone Bolango Regent Hamim Pou, along with the ranks of KPU commissioners in regencies / cities throughout Gorontalo.
KPU Commissioner RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi stressed that the organizer of the Election of Regional Heads should hold integrity, and give equal portions to the regional election contestants.
"Friends of the Bone Bolango KPU, Bawaslu friends can carry out their duties and authorities in accordance with applicable regulations, in accordance with the ethical values that we have outlined together," explained KPU Commissioner RI Pramono Ubaid Tantowi
To the people of Bone Bolango, Pramono Ubaid Tantowi also advised not to expect money politics but to feel what the Regional Head had been doing for 5 years.
"To the public, do not ask candidates for anything during the local election which is once every five years the highest is also one hundred thousand, but you should expect the performance of the regional head for five years. With such a good performance, we really hope that people will feel the value of our democracy, "he added
Lauching Stages of Bone Bolango Pilkada The year 2020 was marked by the release of balloons, and the launch of the Bonebol Regional Election Mascot called "Kopino" and was accompanied by Polopalo music (Gorontalo Traditional Music Instrument)
Previously, the activity began with gymnastics with the organizers with the Bone Bolango community.
